topic.title: Hearing Screening Coded Results Section - conformance rules

lines.i: The Hearing Screening Code Results section SHALL include at least one observation entry describing the hearing screening results as described in the Entry Content Module. Where there are no hearing screening results performed, then the reason SHALL be indicated.

ol.li: SHALL conform to IHE Coded Results Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.28)

Contains zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] IHE Procedure Entry (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19)

Contains zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] IHE External Reference (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4)

Contains zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] IHE Simple Observation (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13)
SHALL conform to IHE Coded Results Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.28)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="30954-2" STUDIES SUMMARY (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Entry (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19)

SHOULD contain at least one [1..*] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] External Reference (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Simple Observation (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13)

Contains zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] IHE Procedure Entry (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19)

Contains zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] IHE External Reference (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4)

Contains zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] IHE Simple Observation (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <section xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <id root="MDHT" extension="1635762989"/> <title>TEXT FOR TITLE</title> <entry> <act/> </entry> </section>
